languages.text: {n}Вайс опускает голову еще ниже.{/n} "Коварные отродья умеют смутить разум. Они нацепили лица тех, кто был мне дорог — моих учеников. Все они погибли... когда я проводил сей обряд в прошлый раз. С тех пор они преследуют меня во снах, в варпе, повсюду. Твари Имматериума, пожравшие их души, терзают меня горечью и стыдом, а ныне пришли и за моим разумом".

{n}Weisz lowers his head further.{/n} "The insidious spawn thrive on confounding one's reason. They donned the faces of those I once held dear. My apprentices. All of whom perished... the previous time I performed this ritual. They have haunted me ever since — in my dreams, in the warp, everywhere. The Immaterium abominations who devoured their souls have been tormenting me with shame and regret, and now they have come for my sanity as well."
languages.original_text: {n}Вайс опускает голову еще ниже.{/n} "Коварные отродья умеют смутить разум. Они нацепили лица тех, кто был мне дорог — моих учеников. Все они погибли... когда я проводил сей обряд в прошлый раз. С тех пор они преследуют меня во снах, в варпе, повсюду. Твари Имматериума, пожравшие их души, терзают меня горечью и стыдом, а ныне пришли и за моим разумом".

The Immaterium abominations who devoured their souls have been tormenting me with shame and regret, and now they have come for my mind as well."

languages.text: {n}Weisz agacha la cabeza aún más.{/n} «Los malévolos engendros confunden las mentes de sus víctimas. Adoptaron los rostros de aquellos a quienes apreciaba. Mis aprendices. Todos ellos murieron... la última vez que realicé este ritual. Me persiguen desde entonces, en mis sueños, en la disformidad; por todas partes. Las abominaciones del Inmaterio que devoraron sus almas me han atormentado con vergüenza y pesar, y ahora han venido a arrebatarme también mi cordura».
languages.original_text: {n}Weisz lowers his head further.{/n} "The insidious spawn thrive on confounding one's reason. They donned the faces of those I once held dear. My apprentices. All of whom perished... the previous time I performed this ritual. They have haunted me ever since — in my dreams, in the warp, everywhere. The Immaterium abominations who devoured their souls have been tormenting me with shame and regret, and now they have come for my sanity as well."

traits.locale_text: {n}Weisz agacha la cabeza aún más.{/n} «Los malévolos engendros confunden las mentes de sus víctimas. Adoptaron los rostros de aquellos a quienes apreciaba. Mis aprendices. Todos ellos murieron... la última vez que realicé este ritual. Me persiguen desde entonces, en mis sueños, en la disformidad; por todas partes. Las abominaciones del Inmaterio que devoraron sus almas me han atormentado con vergüenza y pesar, y ahora han venido a arrebatarme también mi cordura».

languages.text: {n}ワイズはさらに深く頭を下げる。{/n}「影に潜むスポーンは、人の理性をかき乱すことで育つのだ。奴らは、かつて私が愛した者たちの顔を使う。私の弟子たちさ。それは前回の儀式中のことだったが…全員、命を落としたんだ。それ以来…夢の中、<歪み>の中、奴らはどこにでも姿を現す。弟子たちの魂を貪った非物質世界の忌まわしき者たちは、己の恥と後悔で私を苦しめてきた。そして奴らは今、私の正気までも奪いに来たんだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Weisz lowers his head further.{/n} "The insidious spawn thrive on confounding one's reason. They donned the faces of those I once held dear. My apprentices. All of whom perished... the previous time I performed this ritual. They have haunted me ever since — in my dreams, in the warp, everywhere. The Immaterium abominations who devoured their souls have been tormenting me with shame and regret, and now they have come for my sanity as well."

traits.locale_text: {n}ワイズはさらに深く頭を下げる。{/n}「影に潜むスポーンは、人の理性をかき乱すことで育つのだ。奴らは、かつて私が愛した者たちの顔を使う。私の弟子たちさ。それは前回の儀式中のことだったが…全員、命を落としたんだ。それ以来…夢の中、<歪み>の中、奴らはどこにでも姿を現す。弟子たちの魂を貪った非物質世界の忌まわしき者たちは、己の恥と後悔で私を苦しめてきた。そして奴らは今、私の正気までも奪いに来たんだ」

languages.text: {n}威茨的头垂得更低了。{/n}“那些邪恶的怪物扰乱人的心智，由此茁壮成长。它们披着我珍爱之人的外皮，我的学徒们，那些人全都死了……就在上次举行这个仪式的时候。在那之后，那些人的脸就一直萦绕在我心头——在我的梦里，在亚空间里，在任何地方。那些怪物吞噬了他们的灵魂，靠羞耻与悔恨折磨我。现在，他们打算把我也逼得发疯。”
languages.original_text: {n}Weisz lowers his head further.{/n} "The insidious spawn thrive on confounding one's reason. They donned the faces of those I once held dear. My apprentices. All of whom perished... the previous time I performed this ritual. They have haunted me ever since — in my dreams, in the warp, everywhere. The Immaterium abominations who devoured their souls have been tormenting me with shame and regret, and now they have come for my sanity as well."

traits.locale_text: {n}威茨的头垂得更低了。{/n}“那些邪恶的怪物扰乱人的心智，由此茁壮成长。它们披着我珍爱之人的外皮，我的学徒们，那些人全都死了……就在上次举行这个仪式的时候。在那之后，那些人的脸就一直萦绕在我心头——在我的梦里，在亚空间里，在任何地方。那些怪物吞噬了他们的灵魂，靠羞耻与悔恨折磨我。现在，他们打算把我也逼得发疯。”

languages.text: {n}Weisz senkt den Kopf noch weiter.{/n} "Die schändliche Brut liebt es, unseren Verstand zu verwirren. Sie haben die Gesichter derer angenommen, die mir einst wichtig waren. Meiner Lehrlinge. Die allesamt verendet sind ... als ich dieses Ritual zum letzten Mal ausgeführt habe. Seitdem suchen sie mich heim — in meinen Träumen, im Warp, überall. Die Abscheulichkeiten aus dem Immaterium, die ihre Seelen verschlungen haben, quälen mich mit Scham und reue, und nun wollen sie mich auch noch in den Wahnsinn treiben."
languages.original_text: {n}Weisz lowers his head further.{/n} "The insidious spawn thrive on confounding one's reason. They donned the faces of those I once held dear. My apprentices. All of whom perished... the previous time I performed this ritual. They have haunted me ever since — in my dreams, in the warp, everywhere. The Immaterium abominations who devoured their souls have been tormenting me with shame and regret, and now they have come for my sanity as well."

traits.locale_text: {n}Weisz senkt den Kopf noch weiter.{/n} "Die schändliche Brut liebt es, unseren Verstand zu verwirren. Sie haben die Gesichter derer angenommen, die mir einst wichtig waren. Meiner Lehrlinge. Die allesamt verendet sind ... als ich dieses Ritual zum letzten Mal ausgeführt habe. Seitdem suchen sie mich heim — in meinen Träumen, im Warp, überall. Die Abscheulichkeiten aus dem Immaterium, die ihre Seelen verschlungen haben, quälen mich mit Scham und reue, und nun wollen sie mich auch noch in den Wahnsinn treiben."

languages.text: {n}Weisz baisse encore davantage la tête.{/n} « Cette engeance insidieuse n'aime rien tant que berner ses victimes. Ces créatures ont pris l'apparence de ceux qui m'étaient chers. Mes apprentis qui ont tous péri... la dernière fois que j'ai accompli ce rituel. Depuis lors, leur souvenir me hante en permanence, dans mes rêves, dans le Warp... partout. Non contentes de m'accabler de honte et de regret, les abominations de l'Immaterium qui ont dévoré leurs âmes s'en prennent à présent à ma santé mentale. »
languages.original_text: {n}Weisz lowers his head further.{/n} "The insidious spawn thrive on confounding one's reason. They donned the faces of those I once held dear. My apprentices. All of whom perished... the previous time I performed this ritual. They have haunted me ever since — in my dreams, in the warp, everywhere. The Immaterium abominations who devoured their souls have been tormenting me with shame and regret, and now they have come for my sanity as well."

traits.locale_text: {n}Weisz baisse encore davantage la tête.{/n} « Cette engeance insidieuse n'aime rien tant que berner ses victimes. Ces créatures ont pris l'apparence de ceux qui m'étaient chers. Mes apprentis qui ont tous péri... la dernière fois que j'ai accompli ce rituel. Depuis lors, leur souvenir me hante en permanence, dans mes rêves, dans le Warp... partout. Non contentes de m'accabler de honte et de regret, les abominations de l'Immaterium qui ont dévoré leurs âmes s'en prennent à présent à ma santé mentale. »

languages.text: {n}Weisz, başını daha da eğiyor.{/n} "O sinsi yaratıklar, insanların akıllarını karıştırarak beslenir. Bir vakitler kıymet verdiklerimin suretlerine büründüler. Çıraklarım... Ayini gerçekleştirdiğim önceki seferde... Hepsi canından oldu. O günden beridir düşlerimde, öteboyutta, her yerde bana musallat olurlar. Onların ruhlarını yutan Tindiyar ucubeleri, utanç ve pişmanlık duygularıyla bana eziyet eder. Şimdi de akıl sağlığımın peşindeler."
languages.original_text: {n}Weisz lowers his head further.{/n} "The insidious spawn thrive on confounding one's reason. They donned the faces of those I once held dear. My apprentices. All of whom perished... the previous time I performed this ritual. They have haunted me ever since — in my dreams, in the warp, everywhere. The Immaterium abominations who devoured their souls have been tormenting me with shame and regret, and now they have come for my sanity as well."
